alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:10PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Livingston and central Tangipahoa Parishes through 345 PM CDT... At 310 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Independence, or near Hammond, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Independence, Natalbany and Tickfaw. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 33 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa
